code:
```
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);
    logic q_next;

    always @(*) begin
        q_next = q; // Default to hold current state
        if (clk) begin
            q_next = d; // Capture d on rising edge
        end
        if (!clk) begin
            q_next = d; // Capture d on falling edge
        end
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        q <= q_next; // Update q with the next state
    end

    initial begin
        q = 1'b0; // Initialize q to zero
    end
endmodule
[DONE]
```

    input logic clk,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

        q_next = q; // Default to hold current state
